name: Dreamy bloom and the Magic Book
name_original: Dreamy bloom and the Magic Book
description: Dreamy bloom and the Magic Book is a puzzle platformer game. Dreamy bloom is a ladybug who is guardian of the Magic Book in Pure Heart magic school. A Dark-hearted wizard steals the Magic Book. All the magic school is infected by him and Dreamy bloom has lost her ability to fly. The Dark-hearted wizard divided the magic book into 3 pieces and hid them. Now, Dreamy bloom should find all pieces of the magic book to save the magic school and be able to fly again.
